channel.title: Xml2json on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Xml2json on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: xml2json as part of a web parsing pipeline
item.description: The problem, simply put. You have a messy, real world HTML page; you want to parse it to pull out some key element of it, to pass along to some other task; you want that parsing pipeline to be as compact as possible, because you’re running on a small machine, and you’re doing the task frequently, and because the page may change out from under you at any time. Clearly this is not an optimal task to have, but you live with the web you have, not with the web you want to have.
